thread.title: Little Mix open Brits 2017 with 'stunning,' 'spectacular' performance
thread.title_full: Little Mix open Brits 2017 with 'stunning,' 'spectacular' performance

author: Adam Boult
title: Little Mix open Brits 2017 with 'stunning,' 'spectacular' performance
text:
News Little Mix open Brits 2017 with 'stunning,' 'spectacular' performance Little Mix - from left, Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirwall, Perry Edwards and Leigh-Ann Pinnock - on stage at the Brit Awards 2017 Credit: Joel Ryan/Invision/AP Adam Boult 22 February 2017 ‚Ä¢ 8:10pm 
B ritish girl band du jour Little Mix kicked off proceedings at the Brit Awards 2017 with an all-guns-blazing performance of their hit Shout Out To My Ex. 
The foursome were carried on in sedan chairs, and joined on stage by an army of silver-clad backing dancers who, in the words of the Telegraph's Brits livebloggers, carried more than a passing resemblance to 'the War Boys in Mad Max: Fury Road '. 
The performance received a rapturous performance from fans on social media, who described it as "stunning,""spectacular,""breathtaking" and more or less every other superlative you care to think of. ‚Äî Sony Music Global (@SonyMusicGlobal) February 22, 2017 THEYRE BEING CARRIED IN LIKE THE QUEENS THEY ARE. IM SO SHOOK #BRITs -A ‚Äî 1D Updates (@OT4WWUpdates) February 22, 2017 Little Mix delivering all the sass üíÖüèºüíÖüèº #brits pic.twitter.com/0oh21MHQEZ ‚Äî Yahoo Celebrity UK (@YahooCelebUK) February 22, 2017 That was INSANE üôå Who thinks the girls smashed their performance of #ShoutOutToMyEX üôãüì£ Ready to vote?! üòâ #LittleMixBRITs #Brits LM HQ x pic.twitter.com/7SG9CZrBmB
